::Battera::

She was now scared to be in the base.  She had been there all this 
time and no one had threadened her like the wolverine had.  he was 
about to kill her.  She now felt threatened by him being in the same 
base as she.  She felt she had to leave the base and very soon, or it 
could cost her her life. She looked down and didn't want to make eye 
contact with this maximal. She had no friends on the base save 
Firearm.  She couldn't expect him to neglect his duties to just watch 
over her.  She knew her time here was about to end, one way or 
another.
